info.name: Twitch Nightmode v.02c
info.description:
Nightmode theme for Twitch.tv

Featuring easier to read chat, it's very crude and basic at the moment. Still a lot of work to be done, but for now the actual stream page is usable.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

August 25th
- v.02c
- Made list element background purple when a new subscriber text is shown. (Easier to read amidst the chat lines.)

August 22nd
- v.02b
- Removed Kabam link from side nav
- Various cleannup

August 12th
- v.02
- Various fixes on stream page.
- Fixed some colors for content panel fonts regarding headers and lists
- Began work on dashboard page

August 10th
- v.01 Released

To do:
	- Fix dropdown glyph not working on the playing toggle
	- Dashboard page subpages


Credits:
SirFist's Twitch.tv Dark/Black theme (Used to figure out how to specify some selectors and replace images)
